description: This season’s boardshort inspiration ties back our favorite lifestyle looks (imagine a button-up with a modern conversation print, translated for swim), while the color palette works across the entire brand. Which is good news, because we have several lightweight, breathable UPF 50+ tops to pair them with. Even better news? Each style is crafted with recycled polyester.
name: Prana prAna Vintage Boardshorts, 8" Inseam - Mens
